oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tommy Scott Grab Box radio program - XERB
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tommy Scott grab box radio program, sponsored by the Tommy Scott Sales Company, broadcast on XERB (Playas de Rosarito, Baja California.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harry Head; Scotty Lee; John Daniel Quartet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Tommy Scott opening statement -- Tommy Scott sales company advertisement -- [Unidentified gospel recording] (John Daniel Quartet) -- Tommy Scott talks -- The Orphans (Harry Head) -- Tommy Scott talks -- Meet My Jesus (Scotty Lee) -- Tommy Scott talks about more gospel recordings -- Say A Little Prayer ([Unidentified]) -- Tommy Scott talks about his grab box give away, including a rain coat, a cigarette holder, a dozen pens, a miniature bible, 34 tickets to Tommy Scott's show, various gospel group photographs, and 10 records, totaling 100 items -- Tommy Scott explains how to order this grab box -- Closing theme (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Scott, Tommy, 1917-2013; John Daniel Quartet;
